name: pothos-repo-root
description: A strongly typed code first schema builder for GraphQL

scripts.build: pnpm turbo run build --filter='@pothos/*' && pnpm run build-deno
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean && rm -rf ./packages/*/node_modules node_modules ./packages/deno/packages && pnpm i
scripts.ci: pnpm turbo run build generate test type --concurrency=4 && pnpm run lint:ci
scripts.ci:version: pnpm lint && changeset version && pnpm lint --write && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile false
scripts.prerelease: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm run ci
scripts.release: pnpm run prerelease && changeset publish && git push && pnpm git-tag && git status
scripts.git-tag: TAG="release-`date +%s`" && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.snapshot: pnpm prerelease && changeset version --snapshot preview && pnpm install && changeset publish --tag preview

author: Michael Hayes
